message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been designed to enhance your daily life. It comes with a range of features that cater to various needs and preferences. Considering its quality and functionality, I believe it's worth more than $150. Would you like to explore purchasing it at an exclusive introductory price of $200?
Alice, thank you for the offer, but $200 is a bit more than I'm comfortable spending. I'm interested in the product and willing to pay up to $100 for it.  Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I appreciate your feedback and understanding your budget constraints. In light of this, I would like to offer you the product at a slightly reduced price of $150. This is a special offer considering the value we believe the product brings to its users. Please let me know if this revised price suits your needs.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $150 is still a bit outside my budget.  I'm firm at $100. This is the most I can afford at this time.  Let me know if you're willing to work with me.

I understand your position, Bob, and I'm glad we're able to continue discussing this. After careful consideration, I'm willing to meet you halfway at $125 for our premium product. This price reflects the value we place on customer satisfaction while also being mindful of your budget. I hope this revised offer will be acceptable to you.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price, but $125 is still a bit too high for me. I'm happy to pay $110, which is a fair compromise. Let me know if you're willing to work with me at that price.

Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. I appreciate your efforts to find a mutually agreeable price. After reviewing our costs and the value proposition of our product, I am willing to offer the product at $115. This price reflects a balance between our costs and the benefits we believe the product provides. I hope this revised offer meets your expectations.
